items.text: **Aapri Washington** (raised in [[LINK|lang_en|Mount_Holly,_North_Carolina|Mount Holly, North Carolina]]) is an [[LINK|lang_en|Americans|American]] [[LINK|lang_en|Student|student]] and [[LINK|lang_en|American_football|football player]]. He is affiliated with the [[LINK|lang_en|Secondary_school|Secondary school]]. [[CITE|-1|]]
